In this talk [@The-Institute-of-Art-and-Ideas2024-hx] at the [Institute of Art and Ideas,](https://iai.tv/) John Ioannidis, the author of a provocative 2005 paper [@Ioannidis2005-sf], presents an update on the reliability of the scientific literature in the 20 years since his original paper.
